sentence.Network_en: There was a dreadful shindy in the pub last night.
sentence.Network_cn: 昨天晚上酒馆里有人大打出手.

sentence.Network_en: The drunken man kicked up a shindy outside the house where his employer lived.
sentence.Network_cn: 那醉汉在他雇主的住宅外面大吵大闹.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(S2) ... shindig 舞会 shindy 舞会 shine down 照耀下来.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: perhaps an alteration of shinty

means.word_mean: 1. a large and noisy party of people

auth_sentence.content: A Colonial insulted the House of Windsor, which led to words, broken beer glasses, and a general shindy.
